member.name: M:NotYourAverageBicepShoppingApp.ProductRestApi.Controllers.ProductsController.ReadAllProducts
member.returns: An ActionResult containing of representing all products, or if no products are found.

member.name: M:NotYourAverageBicepShoppingApp.ProductRestApi.Controllers.ProductsController.ReadProductByProductId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a product by its ID.
member.param: An integer representing the ID of the product to retrieve.
member.returns: An containing a instance if found, or if no product with the specified ID is found.

member.name: M:NotYourAverageBicepShoppingApp.ProductRestApi.Controllers.ProductsController.ReadAllProductsByProductName(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves all products by a specified product name.
member.param: A string representing the product name.
member.returns: An containing of representing all products with the specified name, or if no products are found.

member.name: M:NotYourAverageBicepShoppingApp.ProductRestApi.Controllers.ProductsController.CreateProduct(NotYourAverageBicepShoppingApp.ProductRestApi.Models.Product)

member.name: M:NotYourAverageBicepShoppingApp.ProductRestApi.Controllers.ProductsController.UpdateProduct(NotYourAverageBicepShoppingApp.ProductRestApi.Models.Product)
member.returns: An containing the updated instance, or if no product with the specified ID is found.

member.name: M:NotYourAverageBicepShoppingApp.ProductRestApi.Controllers.ProductsController.DeleteProduct(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a product by its ID.
member.param: An integer representing the ID of the product to delete.
member.returns: An containing the deleted instance, or if no product with the specified ID is found.
